attributes.action: Increase statutory sick pay during Corona virus to help the self employed.
attributes.additional_details: The government have helped many people financially but seem to have forgotten about the self employed, £94 a week is ridiculously low budget for anyone to live on.
attributes.background: Increase statutory sick pay during Coronavirus to help the 5 million self-employed people. Many self employed people have had there work cancelled due to Coronavirus and have no income causing them to struggle.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300336
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
